sticks.poem: Heaven and earth align in your favor; the hour is auspicious.
sticks.meaning: Good timing for action. Proceed with confidence.
sticks.advice: Seize the moment. Good for contracts, travel, financial moves.
sticks.detail: All factors align. Career advances, romance can be pursued, and small investments may pay off.

sticks.poem: The whale stays in the river; do not rise too soon.
sticks.meaning: Wait for the right moment. Patience is key.
sticks.advice: Stay put. Focus on learning and building skills.
sticks.detail: Still in a dormant phase. Avoid job changes or big investments. Build foundations first.

sticks.poem: Braving wind and rain, you return with little gain.
sticks.meaning: Hard work yields little. Consider a new approach.
sticks.advice: Rethink your strategy. Seek advice from others.
sticks.detail: Effort and reward are misaligned. Try a different method or consult an expert.

sticks.poem: The ancient mirror is whole again; a new chapter begins.
sticks.meaning: Second chances or fresh starts await.
sticks.advice: Let go of the past. Mend relationships or start anew.
sticks.detail: Old bonds can be renewed. Whether rekindling or new love, approach with an open heart.

sticks.poem: Digging for water takes effort; help may come unexpectedly.
sticks.meaning: Persist. A helper may appear when least expected.
sticks.advice: Keep going. Network and ask for help when needed.
sticks.detail: Success takes time. Stay diligent and stay open to mentors or collaborators.

sticks.poem: Integrity stands at the cliff; virtue opens all doors.
sticks.meaning: Act with honesty. Generosity brings reward.
sticks.advice: Keep your word. In partnerships, share credit and profit fairly.
sticks.detail: Trust and generosity matter. Short-term concessions can lead to long-term gains.

sticks.poem: Obstacles block the path; mud and mountains ahead.
sticks.meaning: Many obstacles. Travel or change with caution.
sticks.advice: Delay travel, relocation, or major changes. Be conservative.
sticks.detail: Rough terrain ahead. Postpone big moves until conditions improve.

sticks.poem: The pine stands firm through rain and snow.
sticks.meaning: Strong foundation. Great things lie ahead.
sticks.advice: Build on your strengths. Good for expansion or promotion.
sticks.detail: You are well-grounded. Career can reach new heights; relationships are stable.

sticks.poem: Your heart is clear as the full moon.
sticks.meaning: Act with a clear conscience. All will be well.
sticks.advice: Be transparent. Clear the air if there are misunderstandings.
sticks.detail: Integrity brings blessings. Speak openly, resolve conflicts, and stay honest.

sticks.poem: The treasure lies not afar; look within.
sticks.meaning: Do not seek elsewhere. Cherish what you have.
sticks.advice: Focus on the present. Practice gratitude.
sticks.detail: Answers may already be nearby. Look inward and appreciate what you have.

sticks.poem: Wishes await fulfillment; busy days bring guidance.
sticks.meaning: A guide may appear. Stay patient.
sticks.advice: Stay organized. Ask friends or family for help.
sticks.detail: Life is busy but support is available. Delegate and thank those who help.

sticks.poem: Fortune turns at the threshold; the wise emerge.
sticks.meaning: A turnaround is near. Set your mind and act.
sticks.advice: Rally your spirit. Set goals and take action.
sticks.detail: The low point has passed. Get motivated, clarify goals, and move forward.

sticks.poem: Born of noble roots; all things flourish.
sticks.meaning: Strong roots. Fame and success await.
sticks.advice: Use your resources well. Build your reputation.
sticks.detail: Good foundations. Focus on expertise and personal brand; opportunities will follow.

sticks.poem: The crane escapes the cage; the sky is open.
sticks.meaning: Break free. The path ahead is clear.
sticks.advice: Step out of limits. Good for job change, confession, or new ventures.
sticks.detail: Constraints are lifting. Consider bold moves in work, romance, or life.

sticks.poem: Trouble draws near; the traveler seeks shelter.
sticks.meaning: Stay still. Find a safe place to wait.
sticks.advice: Stay low. Avoid conflict. Mind health and safety.
sticks.detail: Choppy waters ahead. Avoid big decisions and disputes; ride out the storm.

sticks.poem: Worries fade; joy rises like the sun.
sticks.meaning: A jewel emerges. Good news approaches.
sticks.advice: Stay hopeful. Good news may arrive soon.
sticks.detail: Your efforts are bearing fruit. Exams, interviews, or projects may bring good results.

sticks.poem: Ignore idle talk; focus on what is real.
sticks.meaning: Do not believe rumors. Stay grounded.
sticks.advice: Avoid gossip. Focus on your work.
sticks.detail: Rumors may swirl. Stay calm, do your job, and let unfounded talk fade.

sticks.poem: Sun sets, moon rises; the cycle continues.
sticks.meaning: Follow nature. Act from the heart.
sticks.advice: Do not force things. Follow your natural rhythm.
sticks.detail: Steady times. Keep a regular routine and trust the process.

sticks.poem: Rough waters ahead; wait for calm.
sticks.meaning: Wait for the storm to pass. Then proceed.
sticks.advice: Delay risks. Wait for stability before acting.
sticks.detail: Conditions are volatile. Postpone major decisions until things settle.

sticks.poem: Rain clears; the moon and sun shine bright.
sticks.meaning: Old troubles fade. New success awaits.
sticks.advice: Seize the moment. Good for advancement.
sticks.detail: Clouds have lifted. Career, love, and opportunities can all improve.

sticks.poem: Heaven joins the paths; union brings joy.
sticks.meaning: Destiny favors union. Joy follows.
sticks.advice: Strong love luck. Good for proposals and weddings.
sticks.detail: Romance is favored. Singles may meet someone; couples may deepen commitment.

sticks.poem: The dry field receives rain at last.
sticks.meaning: Relief is coming. A turn for the better.
sticks.advice: Hold on a bit longer. Relief is near.
sticks.detail: The difficult phase is ending. Help or opportunity may appear soon.

sticks.poem: Clouds obscure the moon's light.
sticks.meaning: Confusion now. Clarity will return.
sticks.advice: Do not rush decisions. Wait for clear information.
sticks.detail: Information is mixed. Gather more data before making important choices.

sticks.poem: Wisdom lies in daily practice.
sticks.meaning: Ground yourself in routine. Steady progress.
sticks.advice: Start small. Make a plan and stick to it.
sticks.detail: Success comes from consistent effort. Focus on daily habits and long-term growth.

sticks.poem: Dangers passed; peace from now on.
sticks.meaning: The worst is over. Calm lies ahead.
sticks.advice: Relax a little. Stay steady as you move forward.
sticks.detail: The hardest part is behind you. Maintain caution but enjoy the calmer phase.

sticks.poem: Tidings turn vain; a letter from heaven promises rank, yet proves empty in the end.
sticks.meaning: Fame and gain are hollow. Be practical.
sticks.advice: Avoid vanity; focus on duty.
sticks.detail: Rank and wealth are illusory. Stay grounded and do your work.

sticks.poem: Plan with care; when the time comes, a patron lends a hand.
sticks.meaning: Think ahead; a patron will help.
sticks.advice: Plan well; expect patron support.
sticks.detail: Act prudently; when the patron appears, your path will steady.

sticks.poem: News from the east; seek in the west. The rough path leads to treasure.
sticks.meaning: Signs come from many sides; persistence pays.
sticks.advice: Look broadly; persist despite obstacles.
sticks.detail: Good tidings are near; though the way is hard, you may gain.

sticks.poem: The sword leaves its sheath and shines; a patron brings it forth. All bow to its power.
sticks.meaning: A patron reveals your talent; others respect you.
sticks.advice: When a patron supports you, let your light show.
sticks.detail: You have waited long; a patron now helps you stand out.

sticks.poem: Do not aim too high; a stork may hide an arrow. A snake lurks in the grass.
sticks.meaning: Do not overreach; guard against hidden harm.
sticks.advice: Stay content; be wary of hidden dangers.
sticks.detail: Avoid ambition; take care against plots and accidents.

sticks.poem: Sit in stillness; fortune comes without striving.
sticks.meaning: Rest and wait; fortune arrives on its own.
sticks.advice: Stay still; let nature take its course.
sticks.detail: Luck is steady; no need to force things.

sticks.poem: A dream of riches fades at dawn; a mere illusion.
sticks.meaning: Dreams of gain are not real.
sticks.advice: Stay grounded; do not chase illusions.
sticks.detail: Wishes are hard to fulfill; be practical.

sticks.poem: The priceless gem lies within; no need to seek afar.
sticks.meaning: Your treasure is inside you.
sticks.advice: Look inward; value what you have.
sticks.detail: Talent or resources are already yours; uncover them.

sticks.poem: Speak and act with courtesy and trust; loyalty guides.
sticks.meaning: Integrity brings blessings.
sticks.advice: Keep your word; treat others with respect.
sticks.detail: Live by virtue; patrons will come.

sticks.poem: Spring thunder rouses all creatures; you rise from the mud.
sticks.meaning: A turn of fortune frees you from hardship.
sticks.advice: Seize the moment.
sticks.detail: After long dormancy, a change lifts you up.

sticks.poem: The treasure is not abroad; cherish what is near.
sticks.meaning: Do not seek elsewhere.
sticks.advice: Focus on the present; be content.
sticks.detail: Answers may already be at hand; look and be grateful.

sticks.poem: When asking about peace, a candle in the wind is unstable.
sticks.meaning: Luck is unsteady; hold your ground.
sticks.advice: Be cautious; wait for calm.
sticks.detail: Conditions change; stay conservative until they settle.

sticks.poem: The moon shines; then clouds and mist obscure.
sticks.meaning: Fog for now; wait for clarity.
sticks.advice: Do not decide hastily; wait for clear facts.
sticks.detail: Information is mixed; delay big decisions.

sticks.poem: A ladder of stone leads to a chasm ahead.
sticks.meaning: The path ahead is perilous.
sticks.advice: Do not risk; hold back.
sticks.detail: The road is fraught; avoid travel or big changes.

sticks.poem: The sun sets in the west and rises in the east; Yin and Yang trade places.
sticks.meaning: There is a turn in fortune.
sticks.advice: Follow the flow; wait for the shift.
sticks.detail: Fortune fluctuates; more favorable for women, men should wait.

sticks.poem: Remember good counsel; do not mistake foe for friend.
sticks.meaning: Tell friend from foe.
sticks.advice: See clearly; beware of impostors.
sticks.detail: People around you vary; keep your eyes open.

sticks.poem: Heaven and sovereign favor you; your wish is granted.
sticks.meaning: Heaven favors you; your wish can come true.
sticks.advice: Be grateful; your wish may be fulfilled.
sticks.detail: Patrons and heaven support you; things go well.

sticks.poem: Heaven and earth align; all things flourish.
sticks.meaning: Heaven and earth are in harmony.
sticks.advice: Go with the flow; success follows.
sticks.detail: Fortune is strong; career and love can advance.

sticks.poem: Match and countermatch on the board; victory undecided.
sticks.meaning: Equal strength; outcome uncertain.
sticks.advice: Stay calm; do not rush.
sticks.detail: The foe is strong; play steadily and wait.

sticks.poem: Gentleness ever overcomes hardness; virtue brings great luck.
sticks.meaning: Soft overcomes hard; virtue brings blessing.
sticks.advice: Act gently; do good.
sticks.detail: Kindness turns danger into fortune.

sticks.poem: Easy to add flowers to brocade; hard to send charcoal in snow.
sticks.meaning: Help comes in good times; in hardship you must help yourself.
sticks.advice: Prepare early; rely on yourself.
sticks.detail: People help when things go well; in trouble you stand alone.

sticks.poem: Flowers on brocade grow redder; fortune rises.
sticks.meaning: Good grows better; fortune rises.
sticks.advice: Ride the wave; aim higher.
sticks.detail: Career is rising; go further.

sticks.poem: The Kun becomes a Peng in autumn; ready to soar.
sticks.meaning: You are building strength; flight awaits.
sticks.advice: Accumulate; wait for the right moment.
sticks.detail: Like the great bird, you need time before you rise.

sticks.poem: Winds of winter blow; warmth slowly returns.
sticks.meaning: Winter ends; spring nears.
sticks.advice: After winter comes spring; be patient.
sticks.detail: Hard times are ending; hope is near.

sticks.poem: Sail the four seas; hoist the sail. With fair wind, treasure fills the ship.
sticks.meaning: Smooth seas; profit follows.
sticks.advice: Follow the wind; seize the chance.
sticks.detail: As a ship with fair wind; wealth may come, seek in the west.

sticks.poem: Magpies announce good news at the eaves.
sticks.meaning: Joy is coming.
sticks.advice: Expect good news.
sticks.detail: Magpies bring news of marriage, career, or other joys.

sticks.poem: To catch the moon in water costs effort and yields nothing.
sticks.meaning: Chasing the impossible wastes effort.
sticks.advice: Avoid futility; be practical.
sticks.detail: What you seek is hard to get; adjust your goal.

sticks.poem: Loss may turn to gain; dragon and tiger meet.
sticks.meaning: Rough luck can reverse.
sticks.advice: Do not give up; a turn may come.
sticks.detail: Loss hides a turn; wait with patience.

sticks.poem: A dream of riches fades at dawn; it was never real.
sticks.meaning: Dreams of gain are empty.
sticks.advice: Be practical; avoid fantasy.
sticks.detail: Dream wealth is unreal; stay grounded.

sticks.poem: The crane escapes the cage; every path opens.
sticks.meaning: You are free; the way ahead is clear.
sticks.advice: Break free; move forward.
sticks.detail: Limits are gone; pursue what you want.

sticks.poem: Streams run; the moon is clear; the patron is busy.
sticks.meaning: A patron is near but busy.
sticks.advice: Reach out to the patron.
sticks.detail: Help exists; you must ask for it.

sticks.poem: Gossip passes like wind; comfort and fortune come on their own.
sticks.meaning: Ignore gossip; fortune follows good work.
sticks.advice: Ignore idle talk; do your part.
sticks.detail: Rumors fade; diligence brings reward.

sticks.poem: You climb the mountain to learn; the sovereign calls.
sticks.meaning: Unexpected honor finds you.
sticks.advice: Follow the flow; chance may come.
sticks.detail: Not seeking fame, you may receive it.

sticks.poem: Three generations of virtue bring filial children.
sticks.meaning: Ancestral virtue blesses descendants.
sticks.advice: Accumulate virtue; pass it on.
sticks.detail: Good family ways; children will honor them.

sticks.poem: Adding fuel to fire spreads the blaze. Better stop and rest.
sticks.meaning: Your approach worsens things; stop.
sticks.advice: Stop the wrong approach; find another way.
sticks.detail: What you do backfires; halt and change course.

sticks.poem: Sing by day and night; play along with cheer.
sticks.meaning: Be easy; go with the flow.
sticks.advice: Relax; do not take things too seriously.
sticks.detail: Luck is mild; enjoy life as it comes.

sticks.poem: Dawn and dusk rely on Buddha; danger turns to safety.
sticks.meaning: Divine care protects you.
sticks.advice: Keep a good heart; stay safe.
sticks.detail: Sincerity can turn danger into safety.

sticks.poem: The needle fell from the boat; the heart did not seek it.
sticks.meaning: An unintentional loss; let it go.
sticks.advice: Let go; do not cling.
sticks.detail: What is lost without intent need not be found.

sticks.poem: Spilled water cannot be gathered; the broken mirror cannot be whole.
sticks.meaning: The past cannot be undone.
sticks.advice: Accept reality; move on.
sticks.detail: Old chapters cannot be rewritten; look forward.

sticks.poem: Joy at hand is not real joy; danger hides in calm.
sticks.meaning: Appearances deceive.
sticks.advice: Do not trust surface calm; be cautious.
sticks.detail: Smoothness may not last; stay alert.

sticks.poem: The road is steep; the traveler is lost.
sticks.meaning: The path ahead is hard.
sticks.advice: Hold back; wait for a clearer road.
sticks.detail: The way is rough; avoid travel or big moves.

sticks.poem: Your heart is as steady as a golden scale.
sticks.meaning: A fair heart brings blessing.
sticks.advice: Stay just; heaven will favor you.
sticks.detail: Integrity brings success.

sticks.poem: The house is festive; virtue brings lasting joy.
sticks.meaning: A virtuous home enjoys peace.
sticks.advice: Keep doing good; blessings last.
sticks.detail: Family harmony; good deeds bring peace.

sticks.poem: A plum on the ridge in winter; leaves fall but the branch stands.
sticks.meaning: Endure; spring will come.
sticks.advice: Hold on; a turn will come.
sticks.detail: Like the plum in frost; persist and spring will arrive.

sticks.poem: Toiling like a swallow; little gain.
sticks.meaning: Hard work yields little.
sticks.advice: Reduce fruitless effort; find direction.
sticks.detail: Effort and reward mismatch; revise your approach.

sticks.poem: Beyond worldly fame; untouched by dust.
sticks.meaning: Rise above gain and loss.
sticks.advice: Let go of fame and gain; find peace.
sticks.detail: When you release attachment, peace follows.

sticks.poem: Cleverness and cunning backfire.
sticks.meaning: Too clever by half.
sticks.advice: Do not outsmart yourself; be honest.
sticks.detail: Scheming loses trust; honesty lasts.

sticks.poem: Spring thunder rouses all creatures; you rise from the mud.
sticks.meaning: The moment has come.
sticks.advice: Seize the moment; act.
sticks.detail: After waiting, you can now shine.

sticks.poem: Dreams of riches; peaches from the sea.
sticks.meaning: Dreams of gain are not real.
sticks.advice: Stay practical; avoid fantasy.
sticks.detail: Desires are far from reality; stay grounded.

sticks.poem: Like carrying a tiger over the mountain; step with care.
sticks.meaning: Perilous ground; be cautious.
sticks.advice: Proceed carefully; plan each step.
sticks.detail: Risk is high; extra care can see you through.

sticks.poem: Fish and dragon mix; wait in the cold pool.
sticks.meaning: Chaos around; wait.
sticks.advice: Stay put; wait for the right time.
sticks.detail: Conditions are unclear; avoid rash moves.

sticks.poem: Dreams of riches; peaches from the sea.
sticks.meaning: Dreams outstrip reality.
sticks.advice: Focus on what is real.
sticks.detail: Ideals are high; align with reality.

sticks.poem: Cold water and ice; then a patron lifts you up.
sticks.meaning: A patron rescues you from hardship.
sticks.advice: A patron will appear; fortune will turn.
sticks.detail: After hardship, a patron turns ill to good.

sticks.poem: Vows and bonds bring peace and fortune.
sticks.meaning: Good connections bring blessing.
sticks.advice: Build good ties; fortune follows.
sticks.detail: Kindness and connection bring safety and luck.

sticks.poem: You climb to learn; the sovereign calls.
sticks.meaning: Unexpected opportunity.
sticks.advice: Follow the flow; seize the chance.
sticks.detail: Not seeking fame, you may receive it.

sticks.poem: Leaves fall in autumn; the traveler returns like a cloud.
sticks.meaning: Success and a smooth return.
sticks.advice: Mission accomplished; return in peace.
sticks.detail: Work done; the way home is clear.

sticks.poem: Flames rise to the sky; the stream runs dry.
sticks.meaning: Tension is high; stay cool.
sticks.advice: Use softness against hardness; wait.
sticks.detail: Pressure is strong; stay calm, do not clash.

sticks.poem: Spring flowers bloom; treasure arrives by ship.
sticks.meaning: Spring brings wealth.
sticks.advice: Spring is favorable; seize chances.
sticks.detail: Fortune improves; seek gain and move.

sticks.poem: To gain fame at the cost of virtue invites disaster.
sticks.meaning: Fame without virtue turns to harm.
sticks.advice: Guard virtue; avoid complacency.
sticks.detail: The lure of fame can turn good to bad.

sticks.poem: Fog shrouds the path; the moon grows full again. Study and awakening bring a patron to paradise.
sticks.meaning: Clarity will come; a patron will guide.
sticks.advice: Study and reflect; a patron awaits.
sticks.detail: The way is misty; study and reflection bring a guide.

sticks.poem: Spring flowers bloom; treasure arrives by ship.
sticks.meaning: Spring brings abundance.
sticks.advice: Seize the moment; wealth flows.
sticks.detail: Spring favors career and wealth.

sticks.poem: At midday on the ridge; the steep path is hard to climb.
sticks.meaning: Halfway up; the way is tough.
sticks.advice: Proceed with care; you can reach the top.
sticks.detail: Progress is hard but possible; keep going.

sticks.poem: Leaves fall in autumn; the traveler returns like a cloud.
sticks.meaning: The journey ends; return is smooth.
sticks.advice: Task done; return safely.
sticks.detail: Work complete; the way home is clear.

sticks.poem: Celestial nectar; golden turtle's brew.
sticks.meaning: Divine favor; fortune and longevity.
sticks.advice: Fortune and health; all goes well.
sticks.detail: Heavenly blessing; peace and prosperity.

sticks.poem: News flies to heaven; Taishan's treasure loads the ship.
sticks.meaning: Joy from above; you return with a full load.
sticks.advice: Good news near; wealth and joy.
sticks.detail: Tidings approach; gain is likely.

sticks.poem: Banish the frown; fortune and wealth ahead.
sticks.meaning: Ease your mind; wealth may grow.
sticks.advice: Relax; wealth can improve.
sticks.detail: A lighter heart can bring better fortune.

sticks.poem: Wealth from youth; fame and gain follow.
sticks.meaning: Strong roots; success follows.
sticks.advice: Use your resources; rise higher.
sticks.detail: Solid base; you can grow and achieve.

sticks.poem: The phoenix is drenched; sparrows chase it.
sticks.meaning: The noble one is temporarily humbled.
sticks.advice: Hide your light; wait for your time.
sticks.detail: Held back for now, but you will soar.

sticks.poem: Remember the lot: a cart pushed to the wall.
sticks.meaning: Stuck; hard to advance.
sticks.advice: Conditions are tough; hold your ground.
sticks.detail: The path is blocked; wait, do not force.

sticks.poem: Ambition in youth; spirit reaches the sky.
sticks.meaning: Youthful drive; great potential.
sticks.advice: Use your youth; strive forward.
sticks.detail: Young and bold; seize the moment.

sticks.poem: The house is festive; virtue brings lasting joy.
sticks.meaning: A virtuous home enjoys blessing.
sticks.advice: Do good; blessings last.
sticks.detail: Virtue brings reward; family thrives.

sticks.poem: Long rain ends; the moon and sun grow clear.
sticks.meaning: Clouds part; the future brightens.
sticks.advice: Darkness lifts; hope returns.
sticks.detail: Hard times are ending; stay hopeful.

sticks.poem: Plans and efforts come to naught.
sticks.meaning: Striving yields little.
sticks.advice: This path may not work; let go.
sticks.detail: Forcing brings no gain; try another way.

sticks.poem: The horse halts; danger on the path.
sticks.meaning: The road ahead is perilous.
sticks.advice: Stop; conditions are unsafe.
sticks.detail: Travel and big changes are ill-advised.

sticks.poem: East or west; swayed by every word.
sticks.meaning: The mind is unsettled.
sticks.advice: Find your center before acting.
sticks.detail: Direction is unclear; others sway you; steady your mind.
